程式説明：分析民進黨員蔡英文粉絲專頁，資料分析區間為2016/01/01 至 2016/04/06

##讀取蔡英文粉絲團資料
if (!require('Rfacebook')){
    install.packages("Rfacebook")
    library(Rfacebook)
}

token<-'CAACEdEose0cBAGhaOpxUVxkbA45Nbcoc5ZB8edadRF7EmEIZA0QHCVZA2OdhzUZAZBMH8ZBh8dI8FJFwpdeHno4aqhOpnZCsfgqxVBMZCDPHFNx952ulnkBu5EVAs3OYAqxLAC51v01FZCh1xniFCwoZASaRjGjdUXtJFplJr0nnkmMTjqvcrjD4pZBnJUZAmHtPZAUmQf7ptzoYtZBn6Sb9ytsS2h'
totalPage<-NULL
lastDate<-Sys.Date()
DateVectorStr<-as.character(seq(as.Date("2016-01-01"),lastDate,by="5 days"))
for(i in 1:(length(DateVectorStr)-1)){
    tempPage<-getPage("cherngs.y", token,
                      since = DateVectorStr[i],until = DateVectorStr[i+1])
    totalPage<-rbind(totalPage,tempPage)
}
nrow(totalPage)
